description: A conversation where an existing client call is rescheduled from 3 PM to 4 PM on Monday due to a conflict, and a new prep call is added at 3:30 PM.

events.title: Client Call
events.reasoning: Alice can't make the 3 PM client call due to a dentist appointment. Carol agrees to push it to 4 PM. Same conference room (Room B).
events.assumptions: Duration kept at 1 hour, same as original.

events.title: Client Call Prep
events.reasoning: Alice asks for a 30-minute prep call before the rescheduled client call. Carol confirms just the two of them.

mock_llm_response.summary: Rescheduled client call from 3 PM to 4 PM on Monday. Added a new 30-minute prep call at 3:30 PM for Alice and Carol.

notes: Reference datetime is Friday 2026-02-20, so 'Monday' is 2026-02-23. Tests the ability to update an existing event and create a new related one in the same conversation.
